The RSFSR Code on Civil Procedure of CARDINAL DATE ( in force at the material time ) provided that civil cases were to be prepared for a hearing DATE after the action had been lodged with the court . CARDINAL . Summonses were to be served on the parties and their representatives in such way so that they would have enough time to appear timely at the hearing and prepare their case . If necessary , the parties could be summoned by a phone call or a telegram ( Article CARDINAL ) .
